title: Police Investigate Murder on Metzerott Road
body:
Prince George’s County, Maryland…
The Prince George’s County Police Department’s Homicide Unit is investigating a
murder that occurred yesterday evening in Adelphi, Maryland.   On January 31, 2012, at
approximately 6:40 p.m., patrol officers responded to the 1800 block of Metzerott
Road for the report of a shooting.  Upon
arrival, officers found 40 year old Joel
Craig Brown, of the 1100 block of University
Boulevard in Silver Spring, lying in front of the apartment complex suffering
from apparent gunshot wounds.  He was transported
to an area hospital where he was pronounced dead.  Detectives are currently working to identify
a suspect(s) and motive in this case.               Anyone with information about this case is asked
to call the ’s
County Police Department’s Homicide Unit at (301) 772-4925.  Callers
wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS (8477)
text “PGPD plus your message” to CRIMES (274637) on your cell phone or go to  submit a tip
online.
